text: Minstrel Man may refer to: *Minstrel Man (album), a 1980 music album by American country singer Willie Nelson *Minstrel Man (film), a 1944 American film directed by Joseph H. Lewis *Minstrel Man (1977 film), an American television film directed by William Graham ==See also== *That Minstrel Man, a 1914 American film directed by Roscoe "Fatty" Arbuckle and starring him and Ford Sterling
title: Minstrel Man
